text: Myron G. Nussbaum (December 29, 1923 â€“ December 23, 2023) was an American actor and director. He was known for his roles in Field of Dreams, House of Games, Things Change, Fatal Attraction and Men In Black. He was born in Chicago, Illinois. Nussbaum continued to act through his 90s, and he was still working on theatre projects up until his death in 2023. The Chicago Sun-Times called Nussbaum the "oldest working actor" in the United States. Nussbaum died on December 23, 2023 at his home in Chicago, six days before his 100th birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1923 births Category:2023 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American theatre directors Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Movie directors from Chicago
title: Mike Nussbaum
